entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crypto support in wasi-wasm runtime #99126
  • Inspect ASM helpers for JCC Erratum #99125
    Future
  • DateTime format issue with Alpine 3.19 #99127
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99124
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Perf_BinaryIntegerTensorPrimitives #99123
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99122
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/23/2024 10:12:07 PM #99121
  • unsigned right shift operator(>>>) cannot apply to two dynamic objects #99102
  • Test failure: Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling.cmd #99090
    9.0.0

Closed

  • `do-jit-call.wasm` binary in `wasm/runtime` #81691
    9.0.0
  • malloc error during `dotnet restore`on MacOs #99056
    9.0.0
  • ilc compilation failure: Invalid IL or CLR metadata #99047
  • Incorrect CFI unwinding information in ARM64 assembly helpers #98738
    9.0.0
  • Profiler test `profiler\multiple\multiple\multiple.cmd` failing #99091
  • Linker doesn't use correct TypeDefinition to determine if a method is needed as an override of an interface method #98255
  • .NET 8 is not as lazy as .NET 7 when checking JSON-serializability #99089
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection has different interfaces on ref assembly and implementation assembly. #99088
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.UnitTests.GeneratorTests failing with OutOfMemoryException on net7.0-windows-Release-x86-CoreCLR_checked-Windows.10.Amd64.Open #71962
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/EHPatternTests/EHPatternTests.cmd #98909
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
    9.0.0
  • SslProtocols.Tls13: TLS Handshake Header Lists TLS 1.0 #99071

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Support loading Swift self register from SwiftSelf struct #99132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable the new exception handling #99129
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Make the dedup mode output deterministic. #99128
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Add missing GT_SWIFT_ERROR case to GenTree:TryGetUse #99120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most fgGetPredForBlock calls #99118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Intrinsify SpanHelpers Clear/Fill #99115
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove IDE0060 suppressions #99113
    area-System.Memory
  • Reuse x86 GC and unwinding code in NativeAOT #99109
    arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block things needing align8 from preinitializing #99104
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove old fgRemoveRefPred #99099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Batched write barrier for byrefs #99096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not compare Span<T> with 'default' #99095
    area-Meta
  • Fix JitDump for missing string #99094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup comments and ifdefs around this_OFFSET_FLAG #99092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Suppress instances of cs/leap-year/unsafe-date-construction-from-two-elements #99086
    area-System.DateTime
  • JIT: Deduplicate CodeGen::genJumpTable #99110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Avoid reading entire details CSV file into memory #99116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce tolerances for floating point types in TP tests. #99023
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Fix unwinding in some of the ARM64 helpers #99103
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception when dependency is missing #99117
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Mark Vector.IsSupported as intrinsic #99013
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix conflicting TADDR definition #98925
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature checks #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix asserts and GC holes with `Unsafe.Subtract/ByteOffset` #99019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix typo in TryExpandTypeEquality #99101
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add successor edge iterators; remove old fgReplacePred #99097
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move edge likelihood initialization to fgLinkBasicBlocks #99100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable MsQuicTests.CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates test #99108
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable STJ SG unit tests on x86 hardware. #99078
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add GJ_3A to AV_3A, BB_2A and BC_1A #99062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix profiler evacuation loop logic #99075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add some missing opcodes for cfold #99055
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable IPV6 cases of QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect on non-ipv6 systems #98999
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Add some metrics for widening IVs #99051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    arch-x86, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix handling of x86 managed calling convention for hidden parameters #98926
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: start checking sum of successor likelihoods #99024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CI Know issue template to point to helper page and update docs #99077
    area-Infrastructure
  • Copy the NativeAOT AllocateTypeAssociatedMemory to Mono #99072
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Fix regression in jiterpreter trace generation #99083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BX_2A` and `SVE_BY_2A` #99087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle MakeGeneric APIs in dataflow #99037
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Strip unused generic type context for VASigCookie #99026
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Set the exact initial capacity of a List literal #99073
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, Future
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Generalize strategy for finding addrecs #99048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test case for interfaces without impls for whole hierarchy #98540
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
